comment: THE BEST PROFESSOR EVER!!! SUCH AN EASY CLASS AND SHE'S HILARIOUS. she makes you feel at ease and her tests are extremely manageable. she offers a lot of extra credit and her tests/quizzes are extremely straight forward. i love her. everyone loves her. i want to take her again for sure.

She was a great teacher. She was very helpful and easy grading, and wanted you to do well. She counted attendance, but also gave extra credit for coming. She gave extra credit sporadically. Her tests weren't overly hard. I had her for a hybrid and all i had to do outside of class was an online quit. I highly recommend her.
